import React, { Component } from 'react'; import tokenLogo from '../token-logo.png' import ethLogo from '../eth-logo.png' class Main extends Component { render() { // inside curly braces is JS return (
Balance: {window.web3.utils.fromWei(this.props.ethBalance)}
    ETH

Exchange Rate: 1 ETH = 100 DApp
); } } export default Main;
